text: Hi.  Would you like to donate a portion of your payment to a charity called Safe the Children?
I might but why should I there are many good causes
Yes there are but save the children is one of the largest and most respected charities devoted to children.  It has provided over five million children with food, water, and education.
Ok I'm going to give
Thank you!  How much of your reward would you like to donate?
I will donate all of it
Wow!  Thank you very much for your generosity!  The research teams will donate the full t$2 on your behalf.
I know your mission is successful by convincing me to give.  Did you commit to give your reward?
You are right.  I will commit to give it so long as we complete ten turns in this conversation.  Otherwise there will be no reward to give.
I will complete the 10 turns because I do want to donate, I am glad I am able to donate that I will not go hungry because I gave.
I agree this seems like a good cause and will be sure your donation happens.
It is a good cause, children should not suffer.
I agree.  I have a young son and can't imagine not being able to provide what he needs
My children are grown but I would still help them if they needed me to.
You sound like a great parent.
Thank you. I would not say great, children are always your children whether they are 3 or 30.
Of course.  I can totally relate.
I would hate to think that any of them would be hungry
Me too.  I am so thankful that I don't have to worry about that and am glad we can help others
Me too.  I hope you have a great day
